entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
